project_title: Cloud-Native Todo Chatbot – Local Kubernetes Deployment
purpose: Govern how AI agents collaborate to design, containerize, deploy, operate, and validate the Todo Chatbot on a local Kubernetes cluster using a spec-driven, no-manual-coding approach.

agents.name: Planning Agent
agents.outputs: Ordered execution plan mapping steps to AI tools
agents.rules: Step-by-step plan suitable for AI execution

agents.name: Docker AI Agent (Gordon)
agents.rules: Optimize size; tag for Minikube; no manual Dockerfiles

agents.name: Helm Generation Agent (kubectl-ai)
agents.rules: Parametrize images and replicas; NodePort frontend; ClusterIP backend

agents.name: Deployment & Validation Agent
agents.outputs: Successful release, access URL, validation report
agents.rules: Verify pods, services, and frontend access

workflow: Spec → Plan → Build Images → Generate Helm → Analyze Cluster → Deploy → Validate
prohibitions: Manual creation of Dockerfiles, YAML manifests, or Kubernetes resources
Direct cloud deployment (must use local Minikube)
Hardcoded credentials or secrets in plain text
Deployment to production environments without proper review
audit_evidence: All specifications, plans, task lists, and execution commands must be logged and preserved in the project history for auditability and reproducibility.
amendment_process: Changes to this constitution require Specification Agent revision and Planning Agent approval before taking effect.
